long-property.name: Port
long-property.description: Port that will be opened for the communication to the inspectIT User interface.

long-property.name: Graceful Shutdown Time
long-property.description: The "grace" period is the time the container will wait for requests currently inside the container to finish processing before shutting down.

group-property.name: Threads
group-property.description: Defines size of the Jetty thread pool.

long-property.name: Min Threads
long-property.description: The minimum thread number that will be in the thread pool for the incoming requests.

long-property.name: Max Threads
long-property.description: The maximum thread number that will be in the thread pool for the incoming requests.

string-property.name: URL
string-property.description: The JDBC URL pointing to the database.

string-property.name: Driver
string-property.description: The driver class to be used.

string-property.name: Username
string-property.description: The username used to connect to the database.

string-property.name: Password
string-property.description: The password used to connect to the database.

string-property.name: Dialect
string-property.description: The Hibernate dialect to be used.

boolean-property.name: Show SQL
boolean-property.description: If Hibernate should print the SQLs executed.

boolean-property.name: Format SQL
boolean-property.description: If printed SQLs should be formated.

long-property.name: Port
long-property.description: The port used for communicating with agents.

boolean-property.name: IP Based Registration
boolean-property.description: Defines if the agents should be differently registered if they have different IP adresses.

long-property.name: Data Processing Threads
long-property.description: Number of threads that will process incoming data from the agent.

group-property.name: Timer Data Aggregation
group-property.description: Defines properties for Timer data aggregation before saveing to the database.

long-property.name: Aggregation Period
long-property.description: Defines period in milliseconds for which all recieved data will be aggregated as one.

long-property.name: Max Elements
long-property.description: Maximum number of elements aggregator will cache in memory while aggregating.

long-property.name: Persist Period
long-property.description: Sleeping period in milliseconds for thread that is persisting the already aggregated objects.

string-property.name: Default Storage Folder
string-property.description: The name of the folder where all storage related data will be saved.

byte-property.name: Min GZIP Size
byte-property.description: Min size in bytes for which the storage data will be served compressed.

group-property.name: Hard drive space protection
group-property.description: Defines properties that will protect against using all remaning space on the hard drive where CMR is running.

byte-property.name: Max Hard Drive Occupancy
byte-property.description: Amount of bytes that CMR can occupy on the Hard drive for the storage data. Zero value defines no limit, thus all available space will be used.

byte-property.name: Warn on Bytes Left
byte-property.description: Defines amount of bytes left to reach the maximum hard drive occupancy when user will be warned that the left space for storage data is low.

byte-property.name: Stop Write on Bytes Left
byte-property.description: Defines amount of bytes left to reach the maximum hard drive occupancy when all writes to the disk will be suspended.

group-property.name: Byte Buffer Pool
group-property.description: Defines properties for the pool of byte buffers that will be used during serialization and IO operations.

byte-property.name: Byte Buffer Size
byte-property.description: Capacity of the byte buffers in the pool.

byte-property.name: Pool Min Capacity
byte-property.description: Minumum capacity of the pool. If this size is greater than the percentage of direct memory specified by Pool Min Direct Memory Occupancy, it will be decreased to that percentage.

byte-property.name: Pool Max Capacity
byte-property.description: Maximum capacity of the pool. If this size is greater than the percentage of direct memory specified by Pool Max Direct Memory Occupancy, it will be decreased to that percentage.

percentage-property.name: Pool Min Direct Memory Occupancy
percentage-property.description: Percentage of the available direct memory that will be used to decrease the pool minimum capacity if it's higher.

percentage-property.name: Pool Max Direct Memory Occupancy
percentage-property.description: Percentage of the available direct memory that will be used to decrease the pool minimum capacity if it's higher.

long-property.name: IO Executior Threads
long-property.description: The amount of threads in the executor service responsible for writing data to disk.

long-property.name: Serialization Executior Threads
long-property.description: The amount of threads in the executor service responsible for serializing the data.

long-property.name: Max Channels Opened
long-property.description: Maximum number of File channels that will be opened at a single moment. Note that some operating system are limiting the number of opened channels by single JVM.

byte-property.name: Max Index Tree Size
byte-property.description: The maximum indexing tree size in bytes. If tree reaches this size it will be saved to disk and storage will be given second tree to index data to.

percentage-property.name: Eviction Start
percentage-property.description: Defines percentage of buffer to be full so that eviction of elements will take place.

percentage-property.name: Eviction Size
percentage-property.description: Represent a percentage of buffer that is clear when eviction is needed.

percentage-property.name: Maintenance Size
percentage-property.description: Percentage of the buffer size that need to be added or removed for the buffer so that update and clean of the indexing tree is performed.

long-property.name: Indexing Tree Cleaning Threads
long-property.description: Number of threads that will clean the indexing tree parallelly.

long-property.name: Index Element Wait Time
long-property.description: Time in milliseconds that the indexing thread will wait for the object to be analyzed first.

group-property.name: Buffer Size
group-property.description: Define properties that define the buffer size.

percentage-property.name: Min Old-space Occupancy
percentage-property.description: The minimum percentage of the old generation heap space buffer will occupy.

percentage-property.name: Max Old-space Occupancy
percentage-property.description: The maximum percentage of the old generation heap space buffer will occupy.

byte-property.name: Min Occupancy till OldGen Size
byte-property.description: Size of old generation heap space in bytes till which min buffer occupancy will be active.

byte-property.name: Max Occupancy from OldGen Size
byte-property.description: Size of old generation heap space in bytes from which max occupancy will be active.

group-property.name: Expansion Rate
group-property.description: Expansion rate defines how much the calculated object heap sizes in buffer will be increased, as the safty for available heap space not to be exhausted.

percentage-property.name: Min Expansion Rate
percentage-property.description: Minimum expansion rate that will be used.

percentage-property.name: Max Expansion Rate
percentage-property.description: Maximum expansion rate that will be used.

byte-property.name: Max Expansion Rate till Buffer Size
byte-property.description: Defines till which buffer size maximum expansion rate should be active.

byte-property.name: Min Expansion Rate from Buffer Size
byte-property.description: Defines from which buffer size minimum expansion rate should be active.

percentage-property.name: Max Expansion Rate from Heap occupancy
percentage-property.description: Defines how much percentage of the old generation heap space buffer is occupying, so that maximum expansion rate will be used.

percentage-property.name: Min Expansion Rate till Heap Occupancy
percentage-property.description: Defines how much percentage of the old generation heap space buffer is occupying, so that minimum expansion rate will be used.
